headline.main: French Family Arrested on Return From Syria
headline.print_headline: French Family Arrested on Return From Syria

docs.snippet: French authorities say a sister of a man who claimed responsibility on behalf of the Islamic State group for last year's Paris attacks has been arrested with her family on return from Syria....
docs.lead_paragraph: French authorities say a sister of a man who claimed responsibility on behalf of the Islamic State group for last year's Paris attacks has been arrested with her family on return from Syria.

headline.main: Police: 11-Year-Old Boy Found Safe After Taking Family Truck
headline.print_headline: Police: 11-Year-Old Boy Found Safe After Taking Family Truck

docs.snippet: Police say an 11-year-old southeastern Tennessee boy is safe after driving his family's truck to the next county....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police say an 11-year-old southeastern Tennessee boy is safe after driving his family's truck to the next county.

headline.main: Fed Keeps Rates Steady, Signals Hike by Year End
headline.print_headline: Fed Keeps Rates Steady, Signals Hike by Year End

docs.snippet: The U.S. Federal Reserve left interest rates unchanged on Wednesday but strongly signaled it could still tighten monetary policy by the end of this year as the labor market improved further....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Federal Reserve left interest rates unchanged on Wednesday but strongly signaled it could still tighten monetary policy by the end of this year as the labor market improved further.

headline.main: Obama Welcomes Colombia Peace Deal as an Historic Achievement
headline.print_headline: Obama Welcomes Colombia Peace Deal as an Historic Achievement

docs.snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama welcomed on Wednesday a peace deal between Colombia's government and leftist FARC rebels to end Latin America's longest war, describing it as an "historic achievement."...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama welcomed on Wednesday a peace deal between Colombia's government and leftist FARC rebels to end Latin America's longest war, describing it as an "historic achievement."

headline.main: Reasons for Johnson's Improvement Clear as Day, Says Jason
headline.print_headline: Reasons for Johnson's Improvement Clear as Day, Says Jason

docs.snippet: As world number two Dustin Johnson snaps at the metaphorical heels of top dog Jason Day of Australia, the game's leading player has identified the reasons for the American's elevation to the cusp of the global pecking order....
docs.lead_paragraph: As world number two Dustin Johnson snaps at the metaphorical heels of top dog Jason Day of Australia, the game's leading player has identified the reasons for the American's elevation to the cusp of the global pecking order.

headline.main: Ghana Could Be Africa's Number Four Oil Producer by 2020-Report
headline.print_headline: Ghana Could Be Africa's Number Four Oil Producer by 2020-Report

docs.snippet: Ghana could become the fourth biggest oil producer in sub-Saharan Africa by 2020 once two new offshore fields come on stream, to push total output above 240,000 barrels per day (bpd), pan-African bank Ecobank said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ghana could become the fourth biggest oil producer in sub-Saharan Africa by 2020 once two new offshore fields come on stream, to push total output above 240,000 barrels per day (bpd), pan-African bank Ecobank said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Greenland Ice Loss 40 Trillion Pounds Bigger Than Thought
headline.print_headline: Greenland Ice Loss 40 Trillion Pounds Bigger Than Thought

docs.snippet: Greenland is losing about 40 trillion pounds more ice a year than scientists had thought, according to a new study that used GPS to help estimate how much is melting....
docs.lead_paragraph: Greenland is losing about 40 trillion pounds more ice a year than scientists had thought, according to a new study that used GPS to help estimate how much is melting.

headline.main: Kansas Argues Against Boost in School Funding
headline.print_headline: Kansas Argues Against Boost in School Funding

docs.snippet: Kansas sought on Wednesday to avoid a court ruling that could force the cash-strapped state to increase school funding by more than $1 billion....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kansas sought on Wednesday to avoid a court ruling that could force the cash-strapped state to increase school funding by more than $1 billion.

headline.main: Modern Technology Unlocks Secrets of a Damaged Biblical Scroll
headline.print_headline: Technology Unlocks Secrets of a Biblical Scroll

docs.snippet: Experts using a computer imaging program have virtually unwrapped a charred ancient scroll and recovered a fragment of the authoritative text of the Hebrew Bible....
docs.lead_paragraph: Experts using a computer imaging program have virtually unwrapped a charred ancient scroll and recovered a fragment of the authoritative text of the Hebrew Bible.

docs.snippet: A computer imaging program can virtually unwrap and read ancient scrolls....
docs.lead_paragraph: A computer imaging program can virtually unwrap and read ancient scrolls.
